verses.verse: Paul,<WG3972> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> by the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> and Timotheus<WG5095> our brother,<WG80>

To the saints<WG40> and faithful<WG4103> brothers<WG80> in Christ<WG5547> which are at<WG1722> Colosse:<WG2857> Grace<WG5485> be to you, and peace,<WG1515> from God<WG2316> our Father<WG3962> and the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
We give thanks<WG2168> to God<WG2316> and the Father<WG3962> of our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> praying<WG4336> always<WG3842> for you,
Since we heard<WG191> of your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424> and of the love<WG26> which<WG3588> you have to all<WG3956> the saints,<WG40>
For the hope<WG1680> which<WG3588> is laid<WG606> up for you in heaven,<WG3772> whereof<WG3739> you heard<WG4257> before<WG4257> in the word<WG3056> of the truth<WG226> of the gospel;<WG2098>

Which<WG3588> is come<WG3918> to you, as it is in all<WG3956> the world;<WG2889> and brings<WG2592> forth<WG1901> fruit,<WG2592> as it does also<WG2532> in you, since<WG575> the day<WG2250> you heard<WG191> of it, and knew<WG1921> the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> in truth:<WG226>
As you also<WG2532> learned<WG3129> of Epaphras<WG1889> our dear<WG27> fellow servant,<WG4889> who<WG3739> is for you a faithful<WG4103> minister<WG1249> of Christ;<WG5547>
Who<WG3588> also<WG2532> declared<WG1213> to us your<WG5216> love<WG26> in the Spirit.<WG4151>

For this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> <WG5124> we also,<WG2532> since<WG575> the day<WG2250> we heard<WG191> it, do not cease<WG3973> to pray<WG4336> for you, and to desire<WG154> that you might be filled<WG4137> with the knowledge<WG1922> of his will<WG2307> in all<WG3956> wisdom<WG4678> and spiritual<WG4152> understanding;<WG4907>

That you might walk<WG4043> worthy<WG516> of the Lord<WG2962> to all<WG3956> pleasing,<WG699> being fruitful<WG2592> in every<WG3956> good<WG18> work,<WG2041> and increasing<WG837> in the knowledge<WG1922> of God;<WG2316>
Strengthened<WG1412> with all<WG3956> might,<WG1411> according<WG2596> to his glorious<WG1391> power,<WG2904> to all<WG3956> patience<WG5281> and long-suffering<WG3115> with joyfulness;<WG5479>
Giving thanks<WG2168> to the Father,<WG3962> which<WG3588> has made<WG2427> us meet<WG2427> to be partakers<WG3310> of the inheritance<WG2819> of the saints<WG40> in light:<WG5457>
Who<WG3739> has delivered<WG4506> us from the power<WG1849> of darkness,<WG4655> and has translated<WG3179> us into<WG1519> the kingdom<WG932> of his dear<WG26> Son:<WG5207>
In whom<WG3739> we have<WG2192> redemption<WG629> through<WG1223> his blood,<WG129> even the forgiveness<WG859> of sins:<WG266>
Who<WG3739> is the image<WG1504> of the invisible<WG517> God,<WG2316> the firstborn<WG4416> of every<WG3956> creature:<WG2937>

For by him were all<WG3956> things created,<WG2936> that are in heaven,<WG3772> and that are in earth,<WG1093> visible<WG3707> and invisible,<WG517> whether<WG1535> they be thrones,<WG2362> or<WG1535> dominions,<WG2963> or<WG1535> principalities,<WG746> or<WG1535> powers:<WG1849> all<WG3956> things were created<WG2936> by him, and for him:
And he is before<WG4253> all<WG3956> things, and by him all<WG3956> things consist.<WG4921>

And he is the head<WG2776> of the body,<WG4983> the church:<WG1577> who<WG3739> is the beginning,<WG746> the firstborn<WG4416> from the dead;<WG3498> that in all<WG3956> things he might have the preeminence.<WG4409>
For it pleased<WG2106> the Father that in him should all<WG3956> fullness<WG4138> dwell;<WG2730>

And, having made<WG1517> peace<WG1517> through<WG1223> the blood<WG129> of his cross,<WG4716> by him to reconcile<WG604> all<WG3956> things to himself;<WG848> by him, I say, whether<WG1535> they be things in earth,<WG1093> or<WG1535> things in heaven.<WG3772>
And you, that were sometime<WG4218> alienated<WG526> and enemies<WG2190> in your<WG3588> mind<WG1271> by wicked<WG4190> works,<WG2041> yet<WG1161> now<WG3570> has he reconciled<WG604>
In the body<WG4983> of his flesh<WG4561> through<WG1223> death,<WG2288> to present<WG3936> you holy<WG40> and blameless<WG299> and unreproveable<WG410> in his sight:<WG2714>

If<WG1489> you continue<WG1961> in the faith<WG4102> grounded<WG2311> and settled,<WG1476> and be not moved<WG3334> away<WG3334> from the hope<WG1680> of the gospel,<WG2098> which you have heard,<WG191> and which<WG3739> was preached<WG2784> to every<WG3956> creature<WG2937> which is under<WG5259> heaven;<WG3772> whereof<WG3739> I Paul<WG3972> am made<WG1096> a minister;<WG1249>

Who now<WG3568> rejoice<WG5463> in my sufferings<WG3804> for you, and fill<WG466> up that which is behind<WG5303> of the afflictions<WG2347> of Christ<WG5547> in my flesh<WG4561> for his body's<WG4983> sake, which<WG3739> is the church:<WG1577>

Whereof<WG3739> I am made<WG1096> a minister,<WG1249> according<WG2596> to the dispensation<WG3622> of God<WG2316> which<WG3588> is given<WG1325> to me for you, to fulfill<WG4137> the word<WG3056> of God;<WG2316>
Even the mystery<WG3466> which<WG3588> has been hid<WG614> from ages<WG165> and from generations,<WG1074> but now<WG3570> is made<WG5319> manifest<WG5319> to his saints:<WG40>

To whom<WG3739> God<WG2316> would<WG2309> make<WG1107> known<WG1107> what<WG5101> is the riches<WG4149> of the glory<WG1391> of this<WG5127> mystery<WG3466> among<WG1722> the Gentiles;<WG1484> which<WG3739> is Christ<WG5547> in you, the hope<WG1680> of glory:<WG1391>

Whom<WG3739> we preach,<WG2605> warning<WG3560> every<WG3956> man,<WG444> and teaching<WG1321> every<WG3956> man<WG444> in all<WG3956> wisdom;<WG4678> that we may present<WG3936> every<WG3956> man<WG444> perfect<WG5046> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus:<WG2424>
Whereunto<WG1519> <WG3739> I also<WG2532> labor,<WG2872> striving<WG75> according<WG2596> to his working,<WG1753> which<WG3588> works<WG1754> in me mightily.<WG1722> <WG1411>
